attributes.action: Help solve pension situation with ex-pats.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like Gordon Brown to get involved with the enquiry that is to take place in March 2010 to look into indexing ex-pat pensions. Why is Canada, New Zealand and Australia to name just a few not having their British pensions indexed. The Queen is still head of state in the Crown colonies. I think it is horrific that if I lived in the U.S.A. I would get a full pension from Britian as in many other countries.
